column2:
```r
# base graphics
plot(x = iris$Sepal.Length,y = iris$Sepal.Width,            # Note: commands can extend across lines
     xlab = 'Sepal Length (mm)', ylab = 'Sepal Width (mm)',
     main = 'Iris Sepals')
# ggplot
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(iris,aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = Species)) +
  ggtitle('Iris Sepals')
```
